backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for various frontend files covering catalog logic, UI components, branding styles, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark CSS variables and applying global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering public and admin tabs, handling catalog loading and item creation.
Admin container combining banner manager, upload form, and catalog manager.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBanne: Admin tool for uploading, validating, saving, and removing a fixed‑size banner image.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCatal: Table UI listing catalog items with remove actions and basic type display.
Login gate enforcing admin authentication and showing logout and protected content when unlocked.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUploa: Form component allowing admins to input item details, validate media URLs, and submit new catalog entries. Handles label selection, media type selection, and basic URL checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/Backgroun: Renders a fixed background image with a gradient overlay for the app layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/MasparLay: Main layout wrapper providing header, background, content container, and footer with social links and branding. Wraps all public-facing pages.
frontend/src/components/public/Collectio: Displays a grid of collection cards showing name, icon, and item count, allowing users to select a collection.
Renders catalog items in a responsive grid with media-type icons, thumbnails, and click handling. Applies content protection and supports multiple media types.
frontend/src/components/public/PublicVie: Public catalog viewer with banner display, search, filtering, item grid, and modal viewer integration. Manages search, label filter, modal state, and banner updates.
frontend/src/components/public/SearchAnd: Provides search input and label filter dropdown with thumbnails for refining visible catalog items.
frontend/src/components/viewers/ImageZoo: Zoomable and rotatable image viewer with controls for scale and rotation.
frontend/src/components/viewers/MediaVie: Modal viewer that displays images, videos, or PDFs using the appropriate viewer component, with validation and content protection.
frontend/src/components/viewers/PdfFirst: Displays the first page of a PDF in an iframe and shows an error message if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/viewers/VideoVie: Renders a video player with controls and displays an error state if the video cannot load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalog.ts: Loads, cleans, seeds, and manages catalog items with add, remove, and refresh helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and authentication context through a React provider.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styling, theme variables for light/dark mode, and utility classes including glass effects and gradients.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Implements simple admin authentication using hardcoded credentials and localStorage state.
frontend/src/lib/bannerStorage.ts: Handles storing, retrieving, clearing, and synchronizing banner data across tabs using localStorage and custom events.
frontend/src/lib/catalogStorage.ts: Manages catalog persistence with sanitization, migration of legacy items, and CRUD helpers using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/catalogTypes.ts: Defines catalog item types and a runtime type for handling legacy or malformed media types.
frontend/src/lib/collections.ts: Provides default collections and derives the effective collection list based on catalog usage.
frontend/src/lib/contentProtection.ts: Adds and removes handlers to block context menu and drag actions for content protection.
frontend/src/lib/labelLanguage.ts: Empty module placeholder for label language handling.
frontend/src/lib/labelThumbnails.ts: Maps predefined labels to thumbnail image paths and provides helpers to retrieve or check thumbnails.
frontend/src/lib/predefinedLabels.ts: Defines the set of predefined catalog labels and includes a validator for checking label validity.
frontend/src/lib/seedCatalog.ts: Defines an empty seed catalog and lists deprecated seed item IDs and titles for cleanup.
frontend/src/lib/uiText.ts: Provides all UI text strings for headers, navigation, admin screens, public viewer, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, components, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, known issues, architecture notes, and existing feature metadata.
